titleStmt.title: Ireland. By the Commissioners of the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England for the Affairs of Ireland Whereas many persons, who have been in arms against the Parliament of the Common-wealth of England, and have of late come in upon articles, and submitted to the government of the said Common-wealth, and since their said submission ...
